name: Supreme League of Patriots - Episode 2: Patriot Frames
description: In Issue 2, Kyle's transformation into the Purple Patriot is progressing unabated, and he's discovering a lot of new prejudices he never had before. Surrounded by temptations, he's forced to decide whether a campaign of justice can really be founded on some pretty nefarious practices.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 2 GHz (Single Core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or better with 256MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD or Nvidia with 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

reviews.review_text: The writing, voice acting, music, visiuals are all quite good but at the same time they are so boring and bland I just don't get it. For me this dwells in the same league as visual novels. FastClicker.exe through the game using guide to get 100% achievements and don't even bother to understad what's is going on. Nah for all 3 parts.
